entry.title: memo: Office VMware setting
entry.content:
Office environment

Windows XP (32bits) core i3 370M

Todo

upgrade VMware player 4.04 (upgrade last week) install Fedora 17 64bit KDE to VMware recently,my favorite desktop is KDE if CPU is 64bits, Guest OS can select 64bits OS proxy setting create the following files in /etc/profile.d, and then this will work in any shell for any* user of the system

``` sh

proxy.sh

export http_proxy=http://host.com:port/ export ftp_proxy=http://host.com:port/ export no_proxy=.domain.com export HTTP_PROXY=http://host.com:port/ export FTP_PROXY=http://host.com:port/ ```

``` csh

proxy.csh

setenv http_proxy http://host.com:port/ setenv ftp_proxy http://host.com:port/ setenv no_proxy .domain.com setenv HTTP_PROXY http://host.com:port/ setenv FTP_PROXY http://host.com:port/ ```
